verses.name: Luke 23:14
verses.text: Said unto them, Ye have brought this man unto me, as one that perverteth the people: and, behold, I, having examined him before you, have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him:

verses.name: Luke 23:15
verses.text: No, nor yet Herod: for I sent you to him; and, lo, nothing worthy of death is done unto him.

verses.name: Luke 23:16
verses.text: I will therefore chastise him, and release him.

verses.name: Luke 23:17
verses.text: (For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast.)

verses.name: Luke 23:18
verses.text: And they cried out all at once, saying, Away with this man, and release unto us Barabbas:
